instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: Telecommunication networks and the Internet have made communicating with people easier than ever, but have also made surveillance more prevalent than it has ever been in human history.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.

input: Whoever remembers Efuji should show no kindness to any horse.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: The Super Eagles, however, remain seventh in Africa, where Tunisia, Senegal, DR Congo, CHAN champions Morocco, Egypt and Cameroon make up Africa’s top six countries.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: Sitting-without-leaning-the-back-against-something is like standing.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: Whoever talks a lot will misspeak.
output: Ẹní bá sọ púpọ̀ á ṣìsọ.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: A farmer does not make new clothes monthly, only annually.
output: Àgbẹ̀ ò dáṣọ lóṣù, àfọdún.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: Do not eat up my stew with pounded yam made from wateryams before your trip into the forest farm.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: While our brothers have enjoyed national registration in Kyrgyzstan since 1998, after a new law on religion came into force in 2008, local authorities have routinely denied our brothers registration in cities in the southern region of the country, where Osh is located.
output: Àwọn ará wa jọlá bí ìjọba àpapọ̀ ṣe forúkọ ẹ̀sìn wọn sílẹ̀ ní Kyrgyzstan látọdún 1998, àmọ́ lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n gbé òfin kan nípa ẹ̀sìn jáde lọ́dún 2008, léraléra ni àwọn aláṣẹ tó wà láwọn ìlú ní agbègbè gúúsù orílẹ̀-èdè náà bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí í kọ̀ láti forúkọ ẹ̀sìn wọn sílẹ̀, apá ibẹ̀ sì ni ìlú Osh wà.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: To support the local publishers, the campaign drew 476 volunteers from seven countries—Albania, Austria, Belgium, Germany, Italy, Sweden, Switzerland—to North Macedonia to participate in the preaching efforts.
output: Torí náà, àwọn akéde ọgọ́rùn-ún mẹ́rin àti mẹ́rìndínlọ́gọ́rin (476) ló wá ṣèrànwọ́ fáwọn akéde yìí láti àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè méje ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: Add new address
output: Ṣe àfikún ojúlé titun

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: The old person who incurs debt, he says how much of it will he be around to repay?
output: Arúgbó oǹdágbèsè, ó ní mélòó ni òun ó dùúró san níbẹ̀?

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: So you have one small organization with tiny resources fighting this Goliath.
output: Iléeṣẹ́ kékeré kan ṣoṣo ni ó ń kojú Gòláyátì yìí.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: The drunkard is not a prodigal; it is his money that he is spending.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: What exactly is bothering you?

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: Starting in 2011, however, some brothers filed complaints with the Constitutional Court because the law provided no option other than imprisonment for their stand of conscience.
output: Ara ohun tó sì máa ń yọrí sí ni pé kìí jẹ́ kí wọ́n ríṣẹ́ bọ̀rọ̀.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: However, we do not put our trust in human courts or officials—our trust remains in Jehovah.
output: Àmọ́, kì í ṣe àwọn aláṣẹ ilé ẹjọ́ la gbẹ́kẹ̀ lé, Jèhófà la gbẹ́kẹ̀ lé.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: A similar WGAD opinion likely effected change in the case of Brother Teymur Akhmedov from Kazakhstan.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: Total questions
output: Àpapọ̀ àwọn ìbéèrè

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: We are glad that our brothers affected by this cyclone are being cared for physically and spiritually.—Proverbs 17:17.
output: Inú wa dùn pé àwọn ará wa tó wà níbi tí ìjì ti jà yìí ń rí àbójútó torí pé wọ́n ń rí ìtùnú látinú Ọ̀rọ̀ Ọlọ́run, àwọn ohun kòṣeémáàní tí wọ́n nílò sì ń tẹ̀ wọ́n lọ́wọ́.​—Òwe 17:17.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: He also won three Serie A titles with Inter Milan and Italian Cups with Inter, Fiorentina and Lazio.
output: Bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni, Ó tún gba ife ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje Serie A mẹ́ta pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Inter Milan, tí ó sì tún tukọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Fiorentina àti   Lazio.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: Learn more about group settings and if participants are interested in learning more about group settings, work with them to keep your Facebook groups private and secure.
output: Kọ́ ìmọ̀ kún ìmọ̀ nípa ààtò ẹgbẹ́ àti bóyá akópa nífẹ̀ẹ́ sí kíkọ́ ìmọ̀ kún ìmọ̀ nípa ààtò ẹgbẹ́, ṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lúu wọn láti mú kí ẹgbẹ́ Facebook jẹ́ ohun ìkọ̀kọ̀ àti ààbò.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: The quake is the strongest to hit Mexico in a century, killing at least 45 people.
output: Ìmìtìtì ilẹ̀ yẹn ló le jù nínú àwọn èyí tó ti wáyé rí ní orílẹ̀-èdè Mẹ́síkò ní ọ̀pọ̀ ọdún sẹ́yìn, èèyàn márùnlélógójì [45] ló pa.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: We are confident that Jehovah will continue to bring ‘comfort to all who mourn’ during this difficult time.—Isaiah 61:1, 2.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: "On February 25, 2019, an application for urgent measures was filed with the European Court of Human Rights (ECHR) on behalf of Brother Sergey Loginov, one of the seven brothers who was tortured by officials in the western Siberian city of Surgut.
output: "Ní February 25, 2019 a kọ̀wé ránṣẹ́ sí Ilé Ẹjọ́ Ẹ̀tọ́ Ọmọnìyàn ti Ilẹ̀ Yúróòpù (ECHR), pé kí wọ́n tètè wá nǹkan ṣe sọ́rọ̀ Arákùnrin Sergey Loginov, ọ̀kan lára àwọn arákùnrin méje táwọn aláṣẹ fìyà jẹ ní ìlú Surgurt tó wà ní ìwọ̀ oòrùn ilẹ̀ Sàìbéríà.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: Brother Stephen Morris, who serves on the CPC, explains:
output: Arákùnrin Stephen Morris, tó jẹ́ ọkàn lára àwọn ìgbìmọ̀ ìkọ́lé náà sọ pé:

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: While torturing our brothers, the officers demanded to know the locations of their meetings and the identity of other Witnesses.
output: Bí wọ́n ṣe ń dá àwọn ará wa yìí lóró, bẹ́ẹ̀ làwọn agbófinró yẹn ń halẹ̀ mọ́ wọn pé kí wọ́n sọ ibi tí wọ́n ti ń pàdé pọ̀ àti orúkọ àwọn Ẹlẹ́rìí míì.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: Mike, see I asked her and she said it is a lie
output: Mike, wò ó mo béèrè lọ́wọ́ ẹ̀, ó dẹ̀ ní irọ́ ni

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: I'm thinking maybe you should give me the address
output: Mò ń rò ó pé tí ẹ bá lè fún mi ní àdírẹ̀si

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: It is when a child sneezes only once that one wishes the child “sneeze and grow old, sneeze and live long.”
output: Ẹ̀ẹ̀kan ṣoṣo lọmọ ń sín tí à ń ní “à-sín-gbó, à-sín-tọ́.”

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: The special meeting included over 200 locations in the Czech Republic and Slovakia, with a total attendance of 25,284.
output: Ibi tó ju igba (200) ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ lọ ni wọ́n ti gbé àkànṣe ìpàdé náà sáfẹ́fẹ́ lórílẹ̀-èdè Czech Republic àti Slovakia, ẹgbẹ̀rún-ún márùndínlọ́gbọ̀n àti igba ó lé mẹ́rìnlélọ́gọ́rin (25,284) èèyàn ló sì pésẹ̀ síbẹ̀.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: We are confident that Jehovah will continue to support our brothers and sisters in South Africa as they face these challenging circumstances.—Psalm 34:19.
output: Ó dá wa lójú pé Jèhófà ò ní yéé ran àwọn ará wa ní South Africa lọ́wọ́ bí wọ́n ṣe ń kojú ìṣòro tó le gan-an yìí.—Sáàmù 34:19.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: We jumped out of the house instead of the fire.
output: A fò jáde kúrò nínú ilé náà dípò iná.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: Invited Branches: Brazil, Britain, Central America, Finland, India, Japan, Korea, Philippines, Ukraine, United States
output: Àwọn Ẹ̀ka Ọ́fíísì Tá A Pè: Amẹ́ríkà, Brazil, Britain, Central America, Finland, India, Japan, Korea, Philippines, Ukraine

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: The person who runs about in the bush courts the danger of falling into a ditch.
output: Ẹni tí ń sáré kiri nínúu pápá ń wá ọ̀nà àti jìn sí kòtò.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: President Muhammadu Buhari on Wednesday received the FIFA World Cup in Abuja as the world trophy tour made a stop in Nigeria.
output: Ààrẹ Muhammadu Buhari gbàlejò ife-ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé, lẹ́yìn tí ife-ẹ̀yẹ ọ̀hún balẹ̀ sílùú Abuja tí ń ṣe olú-ìlú Nàìjíríà lọ́jọ́ru (Wednesday).

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: Atipo does not recognize beans, he says, “Father, I saw white leaves on the farm.”
output: Atipo ò mọ erèé; ó ní, “Bàbá, mo réwé funfun lóko.”

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: I will not go looking for a squirrel in my gourd to eat with pounded yam; but if a squirrel falls into my gourd I will eat it with pounded yam.
output: Èmi ò wá ikún inú agbè fi jiyán; ṣùgbọ́n bíkún bá yí sínú agbè mi mo lè fi jiyán.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: “Protruding twig, do not poke me in the eye”; one must keep one's eyes on the twig from a distance.
output: Igi ganganran má gùnún mi lójú, òkèèrè la ti ń wò ó wá.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: He also promised to renegotiate a deal with Greece's creditors that would allow more money to be reinvested in the country.
output: Bákannáà lótún ṣe ìlérí láti sè ìpàdé pẹ̀lú àwọn Olókòwò Greece láti leè fàyè gba ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ owó síi ìlú.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: Another One of Jehovah’s Witnesses Convicted in Russia
output: Wọ́n Tún Dẹ́bi fún Ẹlẹ́rìí Jèhófà Míì ní Rọ́ṣíà

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: But you know what?
output: Ṣùgbọ́n ṣé ẹ mọ nǹkan?

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: The Japan branch has confirmed that no Jehovah’s Witnesses died.
output: Ẹ̀ka ọ́fíìsì wa ní Japan sọ pé kò sí Ẹlẹ́rìí Jèhófà kankan tó bá ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà lọ.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: CAF president Ahmad says Nyantakyi also offered his resignation as first vice president of the continental body.
output: Ààrẹ àjọ CAF, Ahmad náà fikún un pé, Nyantakyi tún kọ̀wé fipò rẹ̀ sílẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bí igbákejì ààrẹ àjọ ọ̀hún.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: As of August 16, there are 9 Witnesses under house arrest and 25 imprisoned throughout Russia.
output: Títi di August 16, àwọn ará wa mẹ́sàn-án ni wọn ò jẹ́ kí wọ́n jáde nílé mọ́, àwọn mẹ́ẹ̀ẹ́dọ́gbọ̀n (25) sì wà lẹ́wọ̀n káàkiri ilẹ̀ Rọ́ṣíà.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: “Shoot at it” does not help one find arrows.
output: “Ta á sí i” kì í báni wá ọfà.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: The recent throw-it-all-on-the-floor-that-we-may-redistribute-it inheritance was not well distributed the first time around.
output: Dà-á-sílẹ̀-ká-tun-pín, ogún ijọ́un, a ò pín in re.
